rows.label: qst000503_msg0001
rows.name:
First, could you gather some Shepherd's
Purses and Dawn Hydrangeas?

rows.label: qst000503_msg0002
rows.name:
Then, if you take them to an
apothecary in Torigo named Nils,
he'll make a medicine for us.

rows.label: qst000503_msg0003
rows.name:
I'll perform first aid while you're
gone. Please, I'm begging you.

rows.label: qst000503_msg0101
rows.name:
You've already gathered
the Shepherd's Purses and
Dawn Hydrangeas, right?

rows.label: qst000503_msg0102
rows.name:
In that case, if you take them to
an apothecary in Torigo named Nils,
he'll make a medicine for us.

rows.label: qst000503_msg0201
rows.name: Is the medicine not ready yet?
